intro: Seruneum villosum, commonly known as the hairy seruneum, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of South America. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid tropical forests. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and as a houseplant.
